attributes.action: Stop using the New Year's & Queen's Birthday Honours to reward failure.
attributes.additional_details:
Nick Clegg lost his seat at the last general election after his failure to deliver on his primary election manifesto promise. He now openly campaigns to derail the result of a democratic referendum. 
Awarding a knighthood for services as Deputy Prime Minister devalues the honour for those who have actually earned it. To many people, honouring Nick Clegg will be seen as a reward for failure and opposing democracy.
attributes.background: Nick Clegg is be to Knighted for services as Deputy Prime minister, A role he got by promissing the electorate in the 2010 GE he'd scrap student tuition fees. He then renagued on this promise. He has since lost his seat & now campaigns to block brexit the majority voted for by referendum.
